body_html:
You just need to find the definition of libtensorflow_inference.so in tensorflow/contrib/android/BUILD and make it look like this:

cc_binary(
    name = "libtensorflow_inference.so",
    srcs = [],
    copts = tf_copts(),
    linkopts = [
        "-landroid",
        "-llog",
        "-lm",
        "-z defs",
        "-s",
        "-Wl,--version-script",  # This line must be directly followed by LINKER_SCRIPT.
        LINKER_SCRIPT,
    ],
    linkshared = 1,
    linkstatic = 1,
    tags = [
        "manual",
        "notap",
    ],
    deps = [
        ":android_tensorflow_inference_jni",
        "//tensorflow/core:android_tensorflow_lib",
        LINKER_SCRIPT,
    ],
)

cc_binary(

body:
You just need to find the definition of libtensorflow_inference.so in [tensorflow/contrib/android/BUILD](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/android/BUILD) and make it look like this:

```
cc_binary(
    name = "libtensorflow_inference.so",
    srcs = [],
    copts = tf_copts(),
    linkopts = [
        "-landroid",
        "-llog",
        "-lm",
        "-z defs",
        "-s",
        "-Wl,--version-script",  # This line must be directly followed by LINKER_SCRIPT.
        LINKER_SCRIPT,
    ],
    linkshared = 1,
    linkstatic = 1,
    tags = [
        "manual",
        "notap",
    ],
    deps = [
        ":android_tensorflow_inference_jni",
        "//tensorflow/core:android_tensorflow_lib",
        LINKER_SCRIPT,
    ],
)
```
